name: retrace
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go back over something, for example a path or a series of past actions: When he realized he had lost his keys, he retraced in his mind his movements that day.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Remembering, reminding and reminders

Idiom
retrace your steps
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go back over a path or a series of past actions: This trail is not circular, so you have to retrace your steps back to the start.
